name: Duality (itch) (Ryan Kwok)
description:
This game was made for a small 24 hour game jam. It is a competitive platformer where you try to reach the exit while manipulating your opponents movement.

2 players only. Controller required.

Player 1 Controls (Controller):
Left joystick to move, left trigger to jump
Right joystick to control opponent. Right trigger to control opponent jump

Player 2 Controls (Keyboard):
Arrow keys to move and jump
WASD to control opponent

Touching a buzzsaw will give opponent momentary control over you.
Touching a shield will prevent opponent manipulation for a short period of time.

Credits:
Laura Uzhakhova - cutscenes, concept art, sound design
Mykola Bereza - gameplay design, character sprites, concept art
Tigran Katolikyan - Storytelling, voice acting, level design, art direction
Chris Zhao - Environment artist, storytelling
Ryan Kwok - Programmer, level design
